H0.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Monarchy

H1.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Theocracy

H2.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Confederacy

H3.text: what type of government does iraq have now. Republic

A4.text: The Republic of Iraq is defined under the current Constitution as a democratic, federal parliamentary republic.

A5.text: In October 2005, the new Constitution of Iraq was approved in a referendum with a 78% overall majority, although the percentage of support varied widely between the country's territories.
